bug.short_desc: [dom] ASTParser.createBindings() ignores parameterization of a method invocation

long_desc.thetext:
First attempt was a tiny change in CompilationUnitResolver, which worked, but...
Then I studied the history of the line I changed, found it was created on behalf of bug 90392 which reads like it was actually reverted so this left me slightly confused.
Finally, I found that alternative tiny fixes in ResolvedBinary{Type,Method,Field} should have even narrower effect and should actually be beyond doubt, because those type's getKey() and getKey(boolean) were obviously inconsistent! This latter fix is being tested via gerrit/hudson (patch set 2).
For good measure I locally ran org.eclipse.jdt.ui.tests.AutomatedSuite and all is fine on this front.
Gerrit change https://git.eclipse.org/r/45820 was merged to [master]. Commit: http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?id=96a1c4eb2fdb5445d2326ae03dc755cc22a50d35
Verified for 4.5 M7 with build I20150426-2000.
